description: After installing the security update KB-118.0.2088.46 for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based), some users may experience issues with the browser not updating properly. This can manifest as failure to download or apply the latest updates, leaving the system exposed to risks associated with older versions. Users are encouraged to check their browser version using the help menu and ensure they are running the stable version 118.0.2088.46 as of October 13, 2023.
